marklogic.body: it's called the budgeting process and priorities.Â the dems in oly have never done that.Â in 09 when we were in recession, they kicked the can then, Depending on "stimulus", fund shifts andÂ a few cuts.Â then they tried raising taxes in 2010 and look how well that worked out.Â it is only now that real cuts have occurred and the dems are constitutionally unable to say no to their Bleeding heart supplicants.Â if mckenna was governor and one chamber was not in the hands of lefties, k-12 would get funded properly.Â if the state would stop throwing away billions in health care programs K-12 would see more money.
